channel.title: [PI] Compiling Question
channel.description:
Okay I have no idea how to explain this but I will do my best. I was coding Delta for a few past days and a friend told me I should use PI know for Project Insanity for my Base Source. I just downloaded a shitty Server from the Downloads Section from this website. When I open the source file it has, [b]Bin, Data, deps , src, run, compile[/b] and other files that are not worth mentioning. When I go [b]src>server>model>players and/or into packets[/b] I get files like [b]ItemonItem, ItemonNPC, ClanChat, Client, Potions.[/b] You may wonder whats the problem, so here it is. When I Change something in those .JAVA files I dont see a compiler, I tried Putting a compiler inside the folder with the .JAVA files but I get 100 Errors. I dont understand how I'm suppose to Compile those Files without the compiler being in that folder, but if I go back to the [b]Bin, Data, deps , src, run, compile[/b] and compile there, restart server and I see no Changes can somebody please track me on the right road, I got no idea what I'm doing, and also can somebody link me to a good PI Source+Client.
Thank you to anybody who posted!

item.title: [PI] Compiling Question
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

Just put it where your run.bat is

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiling Question
item.dc:creator: @freshintake freshintake
item.description:
@freshintake wrote:

Sorry were do i put the compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiling Question
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

make a .bat and put this in there @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause and name it Compiler

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Compiling Question
item.dc:creator: @freshintake freshintake
item.description:
@freshintake wrote:

Okay I have no idea how to explain this but I will do my best. I was coding Delta for a few past days and a friend told me I should use PI know for Project Insanity for my Base Source. I just downloaded a shitty Server from the Downloads Section from this website. When I open the source file it has, Bin, Data, deps , src, run, compile and other files that are not worth mentioning. When I go src>server>model>players and/or into packets I get files like ItemonItem, ItemonNPC, ClanChat, Client, Potions. You may wonder whats the problem, so here it is. When I Change something in those .JAVA files I dont see a compiler, I tried Putting a compiler inside the folder with the .JAVA files but I get 100 Errors. I dont understand how I’m suppose to Compile those Files without the compiler being in that folder, but if I go back to the Bin, Data, deps , src, run, compile and compile there, restart server and I see no Changes can somebody please track me on the right road, I got no idea what I’m doing, and also can somebody link me to a good PI Source+Client.

Thank you to anybody who posted!
